China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 2 月 19 日星期一 16:52:21 GMT 120
All about Currys, UK chain China's JD.com and US fund Elliott vie forCurrys shares soared on Monday after Chinese online retailer JD.com joined U.S. activist investor Elliott Advisors in a battle to buy the British home appliance and electronics retailer, which has already rebuffed Elliott's 700 million pound ($881.79 million) opening bid. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 15:40:15 GMT G2LMUDUDLRJ5LLLIZESTKSMYYA https://www.reuters.com/markets/deals/all-about-currys-uk-chain-chinas-jdcom-us-fund-elliott-vie-2024-02-19/Reuters可持续发展可持续财务与报告
Messi sets record straight over Hong Kong absenceLionel Messi took to one of China's largest social media platforms on Monday to address speculation over his non-appearance in a recent Inter Miami friendly in Hong Kong. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 14:49:10 GMT XIGXYS7ZVJKY7PDA2WEST4HI https://www.reuters.com/sports/soccer/messi-sets-record-straight-over-hong-kong-absence-2024-02-19/Reuters运动的足球
China coast guard boarded Taiwanese boat near frontline islands, Taiwan saysChinese coast guard personnel briefly boarded a Taiwanese tourist boat near Taiwan-controlled islands next to China's coast on Monday, the government in Taipei said, in an escalation of tensions after China said it would carry out regular patrols. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 13:16:54 GMT ZXNGETU6KJNVDOVINIBXVPNFXE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-coast-guard-boarded-taiwanese-boat-near-frontline-islands-taiwan-says-2024-02-19/Reuters世界亚太地区
China's securities watchdog opens ears for proposals to revive marketChina's securities watchdog said it held a series of seminars on Sunday and Monday with market participants who proposed tighter scrutiny of company listings and trading behaviour as part of efforts to revive market confidence. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 13:04:05 GMT 57MUA2M3ORIYLITBU2F3HPWRTQ https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/chinas-securities-watchdog-open-ears-proposals-revive-market-2024-02-19/Reuters可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
Exclusive: Turkish-Russian trade hit by fresh US sanctions threatA U.S. threat to hit financial firms doing business with Russia with sanctions has chilled Turkish-Russian trade, disrupting or slowing some payments for both imported oil and Turkish exports, according to seven sources familiar with the matter. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 12:32:16 GMT ZK3X3G7YUNMSHH2ULPOLYWTM2M https://www.reuters.com/markets/turkish- Russian-trade-hit-by-fresh-us-sanctions-threat-2024-02-19/Can Sezer, Nevzat Devranoglu, Dmitry Zhdannikov市场
Airlines group chief backs Boeing CEO to fix safety crisisBoeing's CEO Dave Calhoun is the right person to lead the company out of its latest safety crisis, after a panel blew out of a 737 MAX 9 plane in flight last month, the head of the world's biggest airline trade body said on Monday. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 11:30:05 GMT KVQ3UJZPEBL2JJEFDNQ2YFNDJI https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/airlines-group-chief-backs-boeing-ceo-fix-safety-crisis-2024-02-19/Lisa Barrington, Joe Brock商业航空航天与国防
EU opens formal investigation into TikTok over possible online content breachesThe European Union will investigate whether ByteDance's TikTok breached online content rules aimed at protecting children and ensuring transparent advertising, an official said on Monday, putting the social media platform at risk of a hefty fine. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 11:01:11 GMT FEKQVZ6RJ5IKRIAJD5LQOYII2 https://www.reuters.com/technology/eu-opens-formal-proceedings-against-tiktok-under-digital-services-act-2024-02-19/Foo Yun Chee技术
Stellantis considering building Leapmotor EVs in Italy, report saysStellantis is considering building up to 150,000 low-cost electric vehicles (EVs) in Italy, in its Mirafiori complex in Turin, as part of its agreements with Chinese automaker Leapmotor , Automotive News Europe said on Monday. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 10:47:01 GMT 7JNAY5GDOBK2DOG4IGFBFGNXYA https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/stellantis-consideration-building-leap-engine-evs-italy-report-says-2024-02-19/Reuters商业汽车与交通
India's projects in Maldives gain pace, despite strained security tiesIndia has stepped up development assistance to the Maldives with projects gaining pace last year, even as ties have soured over new Maldivian President Mohamed Muizzu's demand for Indian troops to leave his country. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 09:03:58 GMT XV3EDJ5JFJL5TI6RROUS5TKB6Y https://www.reuters.com/world/india-projects-maldives-gain-pace-despite-strained-security-ties-2024-02-19/Krishn Kaushik世界
China seen cutting mortgage reference rate for first time since JuneChina is widely expected to trim its benchmark mortgage reference rate at a monthly fixing on Tuesday, as banks' improving net interest margins give authorities some leeway to use monetary stimulus to shore up faltering economy growth. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 07:15:26 GMT L2OQ53VNGFML3LBXFPUOPI37HA https://www.reuters.com/markets/rates-bonds/china-has-seen-cutting-mortgage-reference-rate-for-first-time-since-june-2024-02-19/Reuters市场利率与债券
Chinese EV maker Xpeng to hire 4,000, invest in AIChinese electric vehicle maker Xpeng said it would hire 4,000 this year and invest millions in artificial intelligence, as it seeks to survive what it describes as a "bloody sea" of competition in the world's largest auto market. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 06:49:12 GMT WSQK7E75EZLBRPPFDPNKG4ZBXOQ https://www.reuters.com/business/auto-transportation/chinese-ev-maker-xpeng-hire-4000-invest-ai-2024-02-19/Reuters商业汽车与交通
